org.diachron.detection.utils

Class ChangesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diachron.detection.utils.ChangesManager

  • public class ChangesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Similar to DatasetsManager where a dataset URI is connected with its versions, in this class we have a dataset changes URI which is connected with its changes ontologies. Moreover, we connect each changes ontology with its old and new version named graph. All these relations are stored in named graph http://datasets.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChangesManager

        public ChangesManager(java.util.Properties propFile,
              java.lang.String datasetUri,
              java.lang.String oldVersion,
              java.lang.String newVersion,
              boolean tempOntology)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new ChangesManager instance. The constructor considers a properties file which contains the credentials for Virtuoso, a dataset URI along with two dataset versions of it which are going to be compared.
        Parameters:
        propFile - The properties file.
        datasetUri - The dataset URI.
        oldVersion - The old version of the given dataset URI.
        newVersion - The new version of the given dataset URI.
        tempOntology - A flag which denotes where the created changes ontology is a temporary or not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • changeDetectionExists

        public boolean changeDetectionExists(java.lang.String datasetUri,
                            java.lang.String oldVersion,
                            java.lang.String newVersion)
        The method checks if the given versions a corresponding dataset URI are compared.
        Parameters:
        datasetUri - The dataset URI.
        oldVersion - The old version of the given dataset URI.
        newVersion - The new version of the given dataset URI.
        Returns:
        True if the give versions are already compared, false otherwise.

      • deleteChangesOntology

        public void deleteChangesOntology()
        Deletes the current changes ontology. Moreover it deletes the connection of the changes ontology with the dataset changes URI.

        public java.lang.String getChangesOntology()
        Returns the changes ontology.
